faq.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
faq.description: Answers to common questions about the process, timelines and collaboration.

q1.question: How does the work begin?
q1.answer: We start with analysis of your business, audience and competitors to create a strategy.

q2.question: How long does a project take?
q2.answer: Timelines depend on complexity. Landing page takes 5-7 days, corporate site from 14 days.

q3.question: What will I get in the end?
q3.answer: You get a fully launch-ready product, design files and technical documentation.

q4.question: How does payment work?
q4.answer: We work with 50% prepayment before starting work and 50% after final approval.

q5.question: Can you help after project completion?
q5.answer: Yes, we offer technical support and project development on subscription or per-task basis.
